questions.title: What is your address?

answers.label: Address Line 1 (Including your house name or number)

blocks.title: Introduction
blocks.description: Hello my name is [  ] from the Office of National Statistics. I delivered a card to say we are carrying out a Census Coverage Survey in your area. Could you please spare me a little time for a short interview?

blocks.title: Household section
blocks.description: All the questions are about the people in your household on Sunday 13 October 2019.

content.title: What is a Household?
content.description: A household, is one person living alone or a group of people (not necessarily related) living at the same address who share cooking facilities and share a living room or sitting room or dining area.

questions.title: What is your name?
Were you, or anybody in your current household usually living at {{ answers['address-line-1'] }} {{ answers['address-line-2'] }} on 13 October 2019?
How many people usually lived at  {{ answers['address-line-1'] }} {{ answers['address-line-2'] }} on Sunday 13 October 2019?

content.title: Include
list: Partners
Children
Babies born on or before Sunday 13 October 2019
Housemates
Tenants and lodgers
Students and schoolchildren who lived away from home during term time

content.title: Exclude
list: People who have moved in after Sunday 13 October 2019

answers.label: Number of people who usually lived here on Sunday 13 Ocobter 2019

questions.title: Does anyone else live at {{ answers['address-line-1'] }} {{ answers['address-line-2'] }}?

options.label: Yes, I need to add another person
options.description: Include other adults, children, babies, even if they are currently away for a continuous period of up to 6 months

options.label: No, this is not the main residence of any other adults, children or babies

groups.title: Temporarily away or staying Household Members

content.title: Include people who are temporarily away
list: People who work away from home within the UK
Members of the armed forces
People who are away from the UK for less than 12 months
Other people who usually live here but are temporarily away

content.title: Include people who are temporarily staying
list: People staying temporarily who usually live in the UK but do not have another UK address
People who usually live outside the UK who are staying in the UK for 3 months or more

content.title: Include people who usually lived with your household on 13 October 2019 but have since moved out

options.label: Yes, I need to add someone

questions.title: Who do you need to add?

Did any of these people move into {{ answers['address-line-1'] }} {{ answers['address-line-2'] }} after 13 October 2019?
Are any of these people related to each other?

content.title: What is a householder?
content.description: The householder is the person who lives, or is present, at this address who owns or rents (or jointly owns or rents) the accomodation and or is responsible or jointly responsible for paying the household bills and expenses

questions.description:
The information you have provided will be held securely and treated as confidential as directed by the Code of Practice for Official Statistics.

Once you have submitted your answers, this study will be locked and it will not be possible to re-enter the study.
